title: Build a Personal Portfolio Page with HTML
description: Using HTML and CSS, create a personal portfolio page that showcases your projects. Include semantic HTML5 elements and ensure the page is responsive.

title: Responsive Web Design with CSS
description: Design and implement a responsive landing page for a product or service of your choice, incorporating CSS Flexbox and Grid layout systems.

title: Interactive Web Design with Javascript
description: Develop an interactive web application using JavaScript for dynamic content manipulation and React for component-based architecture.

title: Setting Up Your Android Development Environment
description: Install Android Studio and configure a virtual device for testing your first Android application.

title: Building a User Interface
description: Design and implement a user interface using XML in Android Studio that includes at least one activity with various UI components.

title: Implementing Android Navigation
description: Create a multi-activity Android app that demonstrates the use of navigation patterns and material design principles.

title: Design and Build a Simple Robot
description: Using the concepts learned in the 'Robotics Fundamentals' module, design and build a simple robot that can perform basic tasks, incorporating sensors and actuators.

title: Implement a PID Controller for Robot Motion
description: Apply the 'Robot Control Systems' module lessons to implement a PID controller to manage the stability and movement of your robot.

title: Develop a Robot Simulation using ROS
description: Leverage the 'Robotics Software Development' module to develop a simulation of a robot using ROS and Gazebo, showcasing autonomous navigation capabilities.

title: Sorting Algorithm Analysis
description: Analyze and compare the efficiency of different sorting algorithms on various datasets.

title: Implementing Data Structures
description: Implement basic data structures like stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, and hash tables, and demonstrate their applications.

title: Solving Problems with Advanced Algorithms
description: Apply dynamic programming, greedy algorithms, and explore the concept of NP-completeness through specific problem-solving exercises.

title: AI Historical Milestones Essay
description: Write an essay on the historical milestones of AI, focusing on key developments and their impact on the field.

title: Machine Learning Algorithm Implementation
description: Implement and evaluate a supervised learning algorithm and an unsupervised learning algorithm using a chosen dataset.

title: AI Application Project
description: Develop a project that applies AI in a practical context, such as natural language processing, computer vision, or robotics.

title: Supervised Learning Project
description: Develop a project that applies supervised learning techniques, such as linear regression or classification algorithms, to a dataset of your choice.

title: Deep Learning Experiment
description: Experiment with deep learning frameworks to build and train a neural network model, focusing on either CNNs for image processing or RNNs for sequence prediction.

title: Advanced ML Techniques Research
description: Conduct a research project on an advanced machine learning topic, such as Natural Language Processing, Generative Adversarial Networks, or Reinforcement Learning, demonstrating understanding and application of the concept.

title: Exploring LLM Fundamentals
description: Create a comprehensive report that explores the fundamentals, architecture, and training processes of large language models. Include an analysis of a specific LLM architecture like the Transformer model.

title: LLM Application Project
description: Develop a project that utilizes a large language model for an application in natural language understanding or content generation. Address potential ethical considerations and biases in your project.

title: Research on Advanced LLM Topics
description: Conduct research on an advanced topic related to large language models, such as improving efficiency, exploring multimodal LLMs, or analyzing their societal impact. Present your findings in a detailed paper.
